name: PacFellow
description:
PacFellow is a first-person remake of the classic arcade game PacMan. Avoid the ghosts in the maze and try to collect all 7 pellets.

Minigames coming soon!

Downloading the game will show better results. (Windows only)

CREDITS

Idea by Jonny RaZeR

Ghost model: https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:1272741
